mapper.select: select bc.*, bc.no, bc.content, (select COUNT(*) from board_comment_like WHERE comment_no = bc.no) as like_count, (select COUNT(*) from board_comment_dislike WHERE comment_no = bc.no) as dislike_count from board left join board_comment bc on board.no = bc.board_no WHERE board.no = #{board_no} and bc.recomment is null;

select board_comment.*, (SELECT COUNT(comment_no) AS cnt FROM board_comment_like where board_comment_like.comment_no = board_comment.no GROUP BY comment_no) as count from board_comment where board_no = #{board_no} and recomment is null order by count desc limit 1;
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment(user_no, recomment, board_no, content, reg_datetime, is_blocked, owner_checked) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{recomment}, #{board_no}, #{content}, now(), #{is_blocked}, #{owner_checked})
